description:
Come join us at Cookpad for the first meetup of the MLOps Bristol community!

There will be food, drink, and a couple of talks from some great speakers.

**Timetable:**
**18:00:** Welcome drinks and food: Jose and Demetrios will be cooking 🥁 … Vegetarian Paella 🥘 for the early joiners! If you can’t arrive around 6pm no worries, there will be other food options and, of course, cookies provided by [neptune.ai](http://neptune.ai/) 🍪.

**18:30**: Talk 1 - **Code Quality in Data Science** - **Laszlo Sragner**

**19:00**: Short Break

**19:10**: Talk 2 - **DevOps, Security and Observability in ML** - **Luke Marsden**

**19:40**: Social (Food/Drink)

**20:30**(ish): Networking continues at a pub for those that wish.

**Talk Descriptions:**

**Code Quality in Data Science - Laszlo Sragner**
"You hear a lot of advice on applying code craft paradigms to Machine Learning, but what exactly do you need to do? In this presentation, I will introduce a minimal set of techniques that will help you remove technical debt and make you more productive. I will talk about: Clean Architecture, Design Patterns, Code Smells, Refactoring, Code Readability
and how these come together in a Data Science project."

**DevOps, Security and Observability in ML** - **Luke Marsden**
"In this talk we'll look at how you can build:

* MLOps processes
* on top of tooling stacks
* on top of infrastructure

[Click here](https://app.simplenote.com/publish/D3pZXF) for a deeper dive into what we’ll cover in these three points.

Also, I'll give a sneak peek of something totally new we're working on."

This event is brought to you by [neptune.ai](http://neptune.ai/).
title: MLOps Bristol - Meetup #1
